org.zaproxy.zap.utils

Class StringUIUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zaproxy.zap.utils.StringUIUtils

  • public final class StringUIUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods to manipulate Strings, mainly shown in UI.

    Allows to show whitespace characters (spaces, newlines and tabs).

    Since:
    2.4.0

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • replaceWithVisibleWhiteSpaceChars

        public static String replaceWithVisibleWhiteSpaceChars(String string)
        Returns a string with visible whitespace characters, removing the invisible ones.

        It's replaced carriage return, line feed, tabs and spaces with visible (replacement) characters.

        Parameters:
        string - the source string
        Returns:
        the new string with visible new line characters

      • addVisibleNewLineChars

        public static String addVisibleNewLineChars(String string)
        Returns a string with visible new line characters, shown along the invisible ones.
        Parameters:
        string - the source string
        Returns:
        the new string with visible new line characters

      • containsNewLineChars

        public static boolean containsNewLineChars(String string)
        Tells whether or not the given string contains or not new line characters (both line feed as carriage return).
        Parameters:
        string - the string that will be tested
        Returns:
        true if the string contains at least one new line character, false otherwise.
